1.name: Overload
1.details:
Every time Lightning uses an ability, she gains a stack of overload.

Each stack of Overload grants her increased magic penetration (maximum 5 stacks).

2.name: Lightning Bolt
2.details: Lightning calls down the thunder to strike in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit.

3.name: Electrorb
3.details:
Lightning sends a lightning orb to a target direction.

Upon impact or at the end of the travel, the orb releases a shockwave, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all nearby enemies and slowing them for a short duration.

4.name: Static Link
4.details:
On the first cast, Lightning builds an electrical point.

On the second cast, Lightning creates another point and both points immediately connect, shocking all enemies in between, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and briefly stuning them.

5.name: Thunder Storm
5.details:
Lightning releases a thunder storm around her, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) each wave.

Thunder Storm has 3 waves and the last wave deals additional damage

Lightning gains increased movement speed during Thunder Storm but is unable to cast other abilities.

Each wave also grants Lightning a stack of Overload.
